title: The official TikTok ban is coming (RESTRICT Act)
description:
Compare news coverage. Spot media bias. Avoid algorithms. Be well informed. Download the free Ground News app at https://ground.news/fridaycheckout

 ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬  
 
►►► This video ◄◄◄  

This week Humane, a company of ex-Apple employees raised $100m, bringing them to a total of $230m, the RESTRICT act made a tiktok ban official, and the Applied Materials Centura Sculpta made EUV chip making more efficient.

Episode 138
 
This video on Nebula: https://nebula.tv/videos/tfc-the-official-tiktok-ban-is-coming-restric-act
